quoting Xinhua News Agency.`` In Cote d'Ivoire, we remain increasingly concerned about the Gbagbo regime inciting violence against United Nations peacekeepers,'' U.S. State Department spokesman Philip Crowley said at a regular press briefing. Yesterday, his chief of staff, General Philippe Mangou , lied to journalists that UN peacekeepers had abandoned the neighborhood of Abobo, when, in fact, they had remained there the whole night to ensure the protection of civilians, one of their key mandates.
